title.text: The total price index of commodities and consumer services in urban areas of Iran (inflation index) from 1315 to 1394

description.text: این داده از سایت رسمی بانک مرکزی جمهوری اسلامی ایران گرفته شده است.
Dataset exctracted from the official website of the Central Bank of the Islamic Republic of Iran.
